I've been playing this game since it got released. It could be quite fun if there weren't so many bugs. About six weeks ago, a bug appeared that makes it impossible for me to log in, play or even leave the game. I have to open the task manager to exit the game. The bugs are not funny anymore. You get randomly kicked out of the queue (if the queue even works for once) and you often just glitch through the map, get stuck or worse. Each time an update comes out it crashes the game completely and makes it unplayable. 
Apart from the massive bugs that the developers won't fix for some reason, the balancing is really bad. The killers get more and more stuff while the survivors are getting weaker and weaker, making it really frustrating to play survivor. 

I've contacted the devs five weeks ago and sent them various mails, and they STILL DIDN'T REPLY TO ME. The game still isn't fixed for me. I've spend a lot of time and money on this game and it's really freaking brash of the devs that they seem to be too lazy to do anything about bugs and problems for their players.

So as long as the devs and their support don't start to at least TRY AND FIX THEIR MISTAKES I do not recommend it. Waste of money.

It's a super fun game if you can get past the toxic people. There are a few bugs that should've been fixed a while ago and the one game breaking bug has been there for far too long. I voted for this game for good before, but I can't vote for it now , even though some mechanics are so good and different from other games, many updates.
but for the negative side; the camping is sucky,boring ,not fun and the ranking system is so broken, many noobs are on high rank now, ranking is too easy to climb up and so hard to drop down even re-rank once per month still not help. I'm serious, many toxic and noob on high rank, It's not ok. O_O

One of method to solve camping problem
1. Killer can't see the timer of the survivor on the hook.
2. after hook survivor 10 second, If :
- Killer still stays around, and doesn't have other survivor within 20 m from hook; the time state will increase a little bit.
- Killer still stays around, and has one or more survivors withinin 20 m from hook; the time state will decrease twice faster.

I used to have a positive review for this game, gonna change it to negative.
I can sort of recommend it because, for the price, it's a good game.

Its main problem is this issue:
The core design of the gameplay has an inherent flaw where the gameplay balance can only be in one of these two states:
Either the game is balanced for newcomers and newbies, which results in veteran matches being HORRENDOUSLY in the favor of survivors, with Killers having no chance to win even if they play in the most tryhard, toxic way possible

Or the game is balanced for veteran players, which results in newcomers facing unbeatable killers that they have no hope of not only surviving from, but even lasting more than 10 seconds in a chase.

The developers have struggled to try and find a sweet spot where both skill-groups can have a good, balanced time and have failed. Last time I played, the game was balanced around the veterans, so newcomers simply got fucked and had no chance to have fun.
All fun and games until you come across a camper
